General.Name: Gemadept Corp
General.Description: Gemadept Corporation engages in the port operation and logistics businesses in Vietnam and internationally. It operates through Port operation, Logistics, Trading Real Estate, and Planting Rubber Trees segments. The company operates Phuoc Long ICD Port, Nam Hai Port, Nam Hai Dinh Vu Port, Nam Dinh Vu Port, Dung Quat Port, Binh Duong Port, and Nam Hai ICD Port, as well as invests in the Gemalink Deep-sea Port project. It also provides air cargo terminal, distribution center, project cargo transport, shipping, reefer logistics, and car logistic services. In addition, the company invests in real estate projects. Gemadept Corporation was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
